name: Out Of Memory (Enzo Benvengo)
description:
THE GAME

Out Of Memory is a third-person shooter where your objective is to deliver memories to the new server of the company you work for. Each memory delivered will receive a reward upgrade.

Game developed during Epic MegaJam 2021, based on the theme "Running out of space".

GAME CONTROLS

  • W A S D to move
  • Mouse to look
  • Right mouse button to aim
  • Left mouse button to shoot (when aiming)
  • Left shift to toggle run
  • Left Ctrl or C to toggle crouch 
  • F to toggle flashlight
